Content:: Ihala Medagama Piyasena Gamage (born 10 January 1949) is a Sri Lankan politician, a member of the Parliament of Sri Lanka and a government minister. He has been in parliament 1994, 2000, 2001, 2004, and 2010 from Galle district.  This article about a politician from Southern Province, Sri Lanka is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
Title: Piyasena Gamage - Wikipedia
